entities.name: gawp
entities.description: Grawp is a giant centaur who is trying to find Hagrid. He is described as having a deep, rumbling voice and is able to speak in a loud roar.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story. He is described as feeling Hermione shaking and gripping his arm tightly.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a main character in the story who is being addressed by Grawp. She is described as looking like she is about to faint.

entities.name: hagger
entities.description: Hagrid is a person that Grawp is trying to find. He is mentioned in the story as 'WHERE HAGGER?'

relationships.description: Grawp is searching for Hagrid, as indicated by his loud roars and questions.
